Object-Oriented Programming in C++

"Programming is understanding." -- Kristen Nygaard

The Purpose of This Site

This is the website for CS-UY 2124 at the NYU Tandon School of Engineering, taught by Professor Eugene Callahan. It is intended as a supplement to our textbook, The C++ Programming Language, by Bjarne Stroustrup, the creator of the language.
